summary: Completed comprehensive testing of System Tools feature in System Admin Dashboard. All 4 backend APIs (system/info, system/check-updates, system/database-stats, system/logs) working correctly with 100% success rate. Frontend UI fully functional with all sections displaying correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Code is well-structured with proper authentication checks (role == SYSTEM_ADMIN)
All endpoints properly return 403 for unauthorized users
psutil library used correctly for system resource monitoring
Database stats query uses proper SQLAlchemy async patterns
seed_data_creation: Created test log entries via /api/pg/system/logs/add endpoint during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: System Tools feature fully tested. All 4 APIs working: GET /api/pg/system/info (system info with CPU/RAM/Disk), GET /api/pg/system/check-updates (version check), GET /api/pg/system/database-stats (table counts), GET /api/pg/system/logs (system logs with filtering). Frontend System Admin Dashboard has 5 tabs: المستخدمين, إعدادات الشركة, النسخ الاحتياطي, سجل التدقيق, أدوات النظام. Test file at /app/tests/test_system_tools.py can be reused.
